home.title: HearWell - Free Online Hearing Tests & Tinnitus Tools
home.description: Free, professional-grade hearing health tools. Online audiometer, tinnitus frequency finder, and therapeutic sound generators. 100% private, browser-based, no account required.
home.keywords: hearing test, online audiometer, tinnitus frequency finder, sound therapy, hearing loss, tinnitus relief

audiometer.title: Online Audiometer - Test Your Hearing
audiometer.description: Professional online hearing test with real-time audiogram visualization. Test frequencies from 250Hz to 10kHz. Free, private, browser-based audiometer.
audiometer.keywords: audiometer, hearing test, audiogram, hearing loss, hearing assessment, pure tone audiometry

frequencyFinder.title: Tinnitus Frequency Finder
frequencyFinder.description: Find your tinnitus frequency by adjusting tones from 50Hz to 20kHz. Multiple waveforms available. Free, private, browser-based tinnitus matching tool.
frequencyFinder.keywords: tinnitus frequency, tinnitus pitch, tinnitus matching, tinnitus sound, hearing frequency, frequency generator

tonalMasker.title: Tonal Masker - Acoustic Neuromodulation Therapy
tonalMasker.description: Acoustic neuromodulation for tinnitus using AM/FM modulation and Coordinated Reset therapy. Randomized tone sequences with background sounds.
tonalMasker.keywords: tonal masker, acoustic neuromodulation, coordinated reset, tinnitus therapy, AM FM modulation, tinnitus treatment

noiseGenerator.title: Noise Generator - Custom Colored Noise
noiseGenerator.description: Create custom colored noise with 8-band equalizer. White, pink, brown, violet, blue, and grey noise presets. Free sound therapy and relaxation tool.
noiseGenerator.keywords: noise generator, white noise, pink noise, brown noise, colored noise, sound therapy, relaxation sounds, equalizer

notchedNoise.title: Notched Noise Generator - Tinnitus Therapy
notchedNoise.description: Advanced therapeutic noise generator with 10-band equalizer for tinnitus relief. Multiple noise types, stereo width control, and frequency-specific notching.
notchedNoise.keywords: notched noise, tinnitus therapy, therapeutic noise, frequency notching, tinnitus relief, sound therapy

learn.title: Learn About Hearing Health & Tinnitus
learn.description: Comprehensive guide to hearing health, tinnitus causes, symptoms, and treatments. Educational resources for understanding hearing loss and tinnitus management.
learn.keywords: hearing health, tinnitus education, hearing loss, tinnitus causes, tinnitus treatment, audiometry, hearing protection

about.title: About HearWell
about.description: Learn about HearWell, our mission to provide free, accessible hearing health tools. Open-source project dedicated to improving hearing health awareness.
about.keywords: about hearwell, hearing health mission, open source hearing tools, accessibility

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer & Legal Terms
disclaimer.description: Important medical disclaimer and legal terms for using HearWell. Not a medical device, not FDA approved. Educational and informational purposes only.
disclaimer.keywords: medical disclaimer, legal terms, liability, hearing test disclaimer, tinnitus disclaimer

feedback.title: Share Your Feedback - HearWell
feedback.description: Help us improve HearWell by sharing your experience. All feedback is anonymous and helps make hearing health tools better for everyone.
feedback.keywords: feedback, testimonials, user experience, hearwell feedback, tinnitus app review
